data.title: 10 Attacks a Day: U.K. Sees Record Level of Antisemitism in First Half of Year, Anti-hate Watchdog Says
data.meta_description: The Community Security Trust Reported That 2023 Is the Worst Year for Antisemitism in Britain Since It Began Recording Data. It Also Found That Between January and July, Antisemitic Incidents More Than Doubled Compared to the Same Period Last Year
